Dgame.Audio.Listener



abstract class Listener;
Listener sets the position, velocity and orientation of the sound set. Default is vec3f(0, 0, 0) for position and velocity and vec6f(0, 0, -1, 0, 1, 0) for orientation.

Author:
rschuett

static void setPosition(float[3] pos);
Set the position. Default is (0, 0, 0)

static void setPosition(ref const Vector3f pos);
Set the position. Default is (0, 0, 0)

static void setPosition(float x, float y, float z = 0);
Set the position with x, y and z coordinates. Default is (0, 0, 0)

static Vector3f getPosition();
Returns the current position. Default is (0, 0, 0)

static void setVelocity(float[3] vel);
Set the velocity. Default is (0, 0, 0)

static void setVelocity(ref const Vector3f vel);
Set the velocity. Default is (0, 0, 0)

static void setVelocity(float x, float y, float z = 0);
Set the velocity with x, y and z coordinates. Default is (0, 0, 0)

static Vector3f getVelocity();
Returns the current velocity. Default is (0, 0, 0)

static void setOrientation(float[6] ori);
Set the orientation. Default is (0, 0, -1, 0, 1, 0)

static void setOrientation(ref const Vector3f at, ref const Vector3f up);
Set the orientation. Default is (0, 0, -1) and (0, 1, 0)

static void setOrientation(float u, float v, float w, float x, float y, float z);
Set the orientation. Default is (0, 0, -1, 0, 1, 0)

static Vector3f[2] getOrientation();
Returns the current orientation. Default s (0, 0, -1, 0, 1, 0)
